ratings.comment: Provides really great info about negotiation, salary, and benefits. Grading criteria is vague. Class structure can be uncomfortable: prof. cuts off students at awkward moments and does not handle disagreement well. Readings are good (no textbook for this class) and slides are helpful.
Is a great teacher and willing to help. Gives interesting but long lectures.
Best teacher ever!! Very caring and dedicated.

A bit condescending and lectures had a tendency to bounce all over the place. With tests, if you know the powerpoints you will be fine. For papers,or presentations felt like guidelines/expectations were murky. If you get lucky ( I did once) and hit on what she's looking for easy A. If you mess that up, look for a B. Overall ok.

Anna is really nice and really tries to be engaged with her students.  Unfortunately, her lecture style is quite boring.  Lecture is not really necessary if you do the readings, except for that she occasionally randomly takes attendance.  If you go to lecture, readings are not necessary.  Overall, the class was just ok.

This class was so boring. Lecture is unhelpful (everything you need to know is on the powerpoints and they are all posted online), but she randomly takes attendance. Readings were unnecessary; I didn't do any, and I did fine in the class.
Very unhelpful. Interesting subject matter but lectures are acrimonious. Unfair grading with bogus tests. Avoid.
I was very surprised to enjoy this class as much as I did!  Anna is GREAT!
Assignments were unclear and useless. Grading was unfair and feedback was minimal. Often let class get off track. Quirky and sometimes awkwardly uncomfortable. Really likes denim.
